00051 class uvm_packer {
00052 public:
00053   friend class uvm_object;
00054

00067   virtual void use_metadata(bool b);

00070   // Size of packed bits 
00071   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 
00073   int get_size();
00074   void set_size(int nbits);
00075 
00076   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077   // Operator << for data types that can be packed using this class
00078   //
00079   // These will be invoked from uvm_object's do_pack() method
00080   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00082   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (bool a);
00083   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (char a);

00096  
00097   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (uvm_object* a);
00098   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const uvm_object& a);
00099   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_logic& a);
00100   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_bv_base& a);
00101   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_lv_base& a);
00102   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_int_base& a);
00103   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_uint_base& a);
00104   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_signed& a);
00105   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const sc_unsigned& a);
00106   template <class T> 
00107   uvm_packer& operator << (const std::vector<T>& a) {
00108     // first pack the size of the vector before packing its elements
00109     int n = a.size();
00110     (*this) << n;
00111     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00112       (*this) << a[i];
00113     }
00114     return *this;
00115   }
00116 
00117   virtual uvm_packer& operator << (const std::vector<bool>& a) {
00118     // first pack the size of the vector before packing its elements
00119     int n = a.size();
00120     (*this) << n;
00121     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00122       (*this) << a[i];
00123     }
00124     return *this;
00125   }
00126 
00127   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128   // Operator >> for data types that can be unpacked using this class
00129   //
00130   // These will be invoked from uvm_object's do_unpack() method
00131   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132  
00133   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (bool& a);
00134   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (char& a);
00135   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (unsigned char& a);
00136   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (short& a);
00137   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (unsigned short& a);
00138   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (int& a);
00139   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (unsigned int& a);
00140   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (long& a);
00141   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (unsigned long& a);
00142   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (long long& a);
00143   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (unsigned long long& a);
00144   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (std::string& a);
00145   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (uvm_object*& a);
00146   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_logic& a);
00147   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_bv_base& a);
00148   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_lv_base& a);
00149   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_int_base& a);
00150   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_uint_base& a);
00151   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_signed& a);
00152   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (sc_unsigned& a);
00153   template <class T> 
00154   uvm_packer& operator >> (std::vector<T>& a) {
00155     a.clear();
00156     int n;
00157     // first unpack the size of the vector before unpacking its elements
00158     (*this) >> n;
00159     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00160       T t;
00161       (*this) >> t;
00162       a.push_back(t);
00163     }
00164     return *this;
00165   }
00166 
00167   virtual uvm_packer& operator >> (std::vector<bool>& a) {
00168     a.clear();
00169     int n;
00170     // first unpack the size of the vector before unpacking its elements
00171     (*this) >> n;
00172     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00173       bool t;
00174       (*this) >> t;
00175       a.push_back(t);
00176     }
00177     return *this;
00178   }

00194   void get_uints(std::vector<unsigned int>& v);

00198   virtual void * unpack_obj_header();

00203   //
00204   uvm_packer_rep* m_rep; // internal implementation class 
00205 };
